value.title: Making (some) things transparent in Power BI
value.excerpt: Did you know that you can set transparency as a "color" in Power BI ? In this video I will show you how to do it together with an example of why it is useful.  Enjoy"  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
